title: The Challenger Disaster: 20 Years On
content:
[url=http://www.cnn.com/2006/TECH/space/01/27/challenger.at.20.ap/]www.cnn.com/2006/TECH/space/01/27/challenger.at.20.ap/[/url][quote]Quote:[hr]Woe to you Oh Earth and Sea
for the Devil sends the beast with wrath
because he knows the time is short
Let him who hath understanding
reckon the number of the beast
for it is a human number
its number is six hundred and sixty six.[hr][/quote]
